languages.tnc: Gameloft: The cost of the full version of this game is $6.60 + the cost of a standard text message according to your messaging plan. The game will be purchased via text message and the transaction will appear on your mobile phone bill. You will only need 1 text message to purchase the full version. You must have sufficient credit to process your order. Support Number: 1300 78 50 25 Support email: support@gameloft.com

languages.tnc: Gameloft: Der Preis fr die Vollversion dieses Spiels betrgt 2€ + die in deinem Mobilfunkvertrag angegebenen Gebhren fr eine SMS. Der Kauf erfolgt per SMS und wird ber deine Handyrechnung verrechnet. Fr den Kauf der Vollversion bentigst du nur 1 SMS. Du musst ber ausreichend Guthaben verfgen, um den Kauf durchfhren zu knnen. Telefonnummer Customer Care: +43 0720 88 0558 E-Mail-Adresse Customer Care: support@gameloft.com
languages.buyscreen: Preis: 2€ - Es fallen die blichen SMS- und Datentransfergebhren an.

languages.support: Fr Kommentare oder Fragen sende bitte eine E-Mail an support@gameloft.com, rufe uns ber die gebhrenfreie Nummer +43 0720 88 0558 an oder besuche die Rubrik Support auf der Gameloft-Website.

languages.tnc: Gameloft: A verso completa deste jogo custa R$7 + o custo de uma mensagem de texto normal, de acordo com seu plano de mensagens. O jogo ser comprado atravs de uma mensagem de texto e a transao aparecer na conta do seu celular. Voc precisa de apenas uma mensagem para comprar a verso completa. Voc deve ter crditos suficientes para que seu pedido seja processado. E-mail de suporte: support@gameloft.com
languages.buyscreen: Preo: R$7 - Tarifas de envio de mensagem e transferncia de dados podero ser cobradas

languages.tnc: Gameloft: Den fulde version af dette spil koster 30 kr. + din udbyders pris for en almindelig SMS. Spillet kbes vis SMS og transaktionen kan ses p din mobilregning. Du behver kun en enkelt SMS for at kbe den fulde version. Du skal have tilstrkkelig med penge p mobilkontoen for at bestillingen kan gennemfres. Tlf. til Support: 72274222. E-mail til Support: support@gameloft.com
languages.buyscreen: Pris 30 kr. + evt. betaling til udbyder for data og SMS
languages.ompd_ed_sc: Kunne du lide demoen? Hent den fulde version af [game]!

languages.support: Hvis du har kommentarer eller sprgsml, er du velkommen til at kontakte os via e-mail til support@gameloft.com, p tlf. 72274222 eller via Support-sektionen af Gamelofts hjemmeside.

languages.tnc: Gameloft: Pelin koko version hinta on 4 € + operaattorisi tavallisen tekstiviestin hinta. Peli ostetaan tekstiviestill ja maksu nkyy matkapuhelinlaskussasi. Sinun tarvitsee lhett vain 1 tekstiviesti pelin koko version ostamiseksi. Tarvitset riittvsti luottoa tilauksen ksittelemiseksi. Tukinumero: 09 725 190 22 Tuen shkposti: support@gameloft.com
languages.buyscreen: Hinta 4 €. Tekstiviestin ja tiedonsiirron kulut voidaan list hintaan.
languages.ompd_ed_sc: Piditk pelin demosta? Osta pelin [game] koko versio!
languages.ompb_ed_mc: Piditk pelin demosta? Osta [game] valitsemalla operaattorisi.
languages.ompb_mcc: Osta [game] valitsemalla operaattorisi.
languages.support: Jos sinulla on palautetta tai kysyttv, lhet shkpostia osoitteeseen support@gameloft.com, soita numeroon 09 725 190 22 tai ky Gameloftin sivuston tukiosiossa. (maksuton numero)

languages.tnc: Gameloft : Le cot de la version complte de ce jeu est de 3€ + le cot d'un SMS standard selon les tarifs de votre oprateur. Le jeu sera achet par SMS et la transaction figurera sur la facture de votre tlphone mobile. L'achat de la version complte ne ncessite qu'un seul message. Vous devez disposer d'un crdit suffisant pour passer votre commande. Numro d'assistance : 0800903778 E-mail d'assistance : support@gameloft.com
languages.buyscreen: Prix 3€ - Cot SMS et connexion en sus selon tarif oprateur

languages.support: Veuillez nous faire parvenir vos commentaires ou vos questions par e-mail support@gameloft.com, composez le 0800903778 ou visitez la rubrique Assistance du site web de Gameloft. (numro gratuit)

languages.tnc: Gameloft: Fullversjonen av spillet koster 30 kr. + kostnaden av en vanlig tekstmelding i henhold til abonnementet ditt. Spillet blir kjpt via tekstmelding, og transaksjonen vil vises p telefonregningen din. Du trenger bare bruke 1 tekstmelding for kjpe fullversjonen. Du m ha tilstrekkelig med penger p telefonen for kunne fullfre bestillingen. Telefon til kundesttte: 241 59 512 E-post til kundesttte: support@gameloft.com

languages.tnc: Gameloft: Koszt pełnej wersji gry to 9 PLN + koszt zwykłego SMSa, zgodnie z twoim planem taryfowym. Gra zostanie zakupiona poprzez SMS, a transakcja zostanie doliczona do twojego rachunku. Aby kupić pełną wersję, potrzebujesz tylko 1 SMSa. Musisz posiadać wystarczające środki na koncie, by zamwienie zostało przetworzone. Email pomocy: support@gameloft.com
languages.buyscreen: Cena 9 PLN - mogą obowiązywać opłaty za SMS i przesył danych
languages.ompd_ed_sc: Podobało ci się demo? Pobierz pełną wersję gry [game]!

languages.support: Uwagi i zapytania prosimy przesyłać pocztą email na adres support@gameloft.com. Można też odwiedzić dział pomocy na stronie WWW firmy Gameloft.

languages.tnc: Gameloft: O custo da verso completa deste jogo de 2.02€ + o custo de uma mensagem de texto normal de acordo com o teu plano tarifrio. languages.tnc: Gameloft: La versin completa de este juego te costar 4€ + el coste de un SMS. Debers comprar el juego a travs de un SMS y la transaccin aparecer en tu factura telefnica. languages.double_optin_2: Juego completo 4€. Al comprarlo solo pagas con 1 sms por valor de 4€. Haz clic en comprar

languages.tnc: Gameloft: Den fullstndiga versionen av spelet kostar 30 kr. + mobiloperatrens kostnad fr ett vanligt SMS. Spelet kps via SMS och transaktionen visas p din faktura om du har ett mobilabonnemang. Det krvs endast ett (1) SMS fr att kpa spelet. Du mste ha tillrckligt mycket pengar p mobilen fr att bestllningen ska genomfras. Supporttelefon: 08-50163257 E-post: support@gameloft.com

languages.tnc:
Gameloft
Contact Details of our Customer Care Phone Number: +41 0435 00 2460 Email: support@gameloft.com
Payment "On my phone bill"
The cost of the full version of this game is 5 CHF + the cost of a standard text message according to your messaging plan. The game will be purchased via text message and the transaction will appear on your mobile phone bill. You will only need 1 text message to purchase the full version. You must have sufficient credit to process your order. Complete Terms and Conditions: gameloft.com/conditions
Payment by Credit Card
The cost of the full version of this game is 3.99€. Gameloft Peace of Mind Guarantee: Gameloft uses advanced encryption security technology to protect your Crecit Card information. Your email address will be used exclusively to send you the bill.

languages.tnc: Gameloft charges $4.99 for one-time purchases of games at T-Mobile®. This is not a subscription service. Complete Terms and Conditions: gameloft.com/conditions Support: For help, email us at support@gameloft.com or text HELP to 84149. Fees: Messages and data rates may apply. These charges are billed to your mobile phone bill or deducted from your prepaid balance. They will appear under "Gameloft". Text STOP to 84149 to opt-out.
